ygData.subject: Re: Phobia in command? Cyberwolf is flattered.
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia tries to stay diplomatic with the Alliance bot. If we had reliable transport I d agree but I ve got two bots here that need immediate medical attention

Phobia tries to stay diplomatic with the Alliance bot. "If we had 
reliable transport I'd agree but I've got two bots here that need 
immediate medical attention and if they don't recieve it they'll be 
permanently offline. Logic dictates that I get them to the nearest CR 
chamber. If that CR chamber is in hostile hands then it's up to me to 
make the situation acceptable. The loss of a leader based on 
indecision is NOT acceptable. So unless you happen to be a qualified 
field tech, I'll thank you to take Dollen toyour HQ and I'll have 
KitKat meet you there when she's capable." Phobia knew that diplomacy 
was overrated when both diplomats carried weapons thats why the 
Predacon army had so few qualified leaders. If possible he didn't 
want to lose command the way so many others had, holes in his frame 
didn't fit in with his sense of fashion.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I just talked to Inferno731, and he says that whoever wants Inferno 
> and Rampage could email him, and he'll will the chars to one of 
them.
> 
> ::Reptilica::
> 
> Reptilica nods at Phobia's decition. It was good enough for him, at 
> least they were getting somewhere.
> 
> "But hey," he says, walking up to Phobia, "The Predacon ship is 
near 
> by, but its owned by Rampage. I think he's hostile to all the other 
> Preds, but I'm not sure. The other Predacon base is waaay down on 
the 
> south of the continent. The Alliance base is much closer than that."
